entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -30.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puvirnituq Airport 12:57 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
